001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.DurationSupport;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.ToolProviderSupport;
005import java.util.Comparator;
006import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
007
008/** A printer of various types using the configured output writer. */
009public record Printer(Bach bach) {
010
011  public void printTools() {
012    print(bach.configuration().tooling().finder());
013  }
014
015  public void print(ToolFinder finder) {
016    var tools = finder.findAll().stream().sorted(Comparator.comparing(ToolProvider::name)).toList();
017    tools.stream().map(Printer::toString).forEach(bach.out()::println);
018    bach.out().printf("  %d tool%s%n", tools.size(), tools.size() == 1 ? "" : "s");
019  }
020
021  public void print(ToolRun run) {
022    print(run, false, 4);
023  }
024
025  public void print(ToolRun run, boolean summarize, int indentation) {
026    var output = run.output();
027    var errors = run.errors();
028    if (!output.isEmpty()) bach.out().println(output.indent(indentation).stripTrailing());
029    if (!errors.isEmpty()) bach.err().println(errors.indent(indentation).stripTrailing());
030    if (summarize) {
031      var printer = run.isError() ? bach.err() : bach.out();
032      printer.printf(
033          "Run of %s with %d argument%s took %s and finished with exit code %d%n",
034          run.name(),
035          run.args().size(),
036          run.args().size() == 1 ? "" : "s",
037          DurationSupport.toHumanReadableString(run.duration()),
038          run.code());
039    }
040  }
041
042  static String toString(ToolProvider provider) {
043    return String.format("- `%s` by `%s`", provider.name(), ToolProviderSupport.describe(provider));
044  }
045}
